com.redhat.rhn.testing
Class RhnMockHttpServletResponse

java.lang.Object
  MockHttpServletResponse
      com.redhat.rhn.testing.RhnMockHttpServletResponse

public class RhnMockHttpServletResponse
extends MockHttpServletResponse

RhnMockHttpServletResponse is a mock implementation of the HttpServletResponse which fixes deficiencies in the MockObjects' implementation of MockHttpServletResponse.
